Name: Immersion
About the game: In 'Immersion' game you have to try on the role of a brave Explorer of the deep sea. Armed with a harpoon, go down into the depths of unexplored underwater caves in search of lost wealth. Many treasure chests scattered in the waters around the mysterious island. The path to them is very complicated, and it is guarded by dangerous creatures. This game is for those who like to explore and choose their own routes. You can join the fight with the shark, hitting her with a harpoon or cunning to get around it, by closing the treasure chest right from under her nose. But be careful, oxygen supplies are limited and you need to act quickly. Features: Many various levels Colorful underwater world Many ways to complete the level Nice high-quality graphics Simple controls Has Steam Achievements Comes with Trading cards! Suitable for Windows, Mac and Linux If you dreamed of adventure, treasure hunting and overcoming dangers, then this game is for you. It will teach you how to quickly learn the route and instantly respond to danger. The game will perfectly brighten up the time for adults and children!
